resources.string: Do you have an account? Login

Application that aims to help the farmer in his work. The application can be used as a kind of Wikipedia on which to add products and their descriptions. It also synchronises with Google Maps to display the exact position of the fields.
We are a StartUp company that deals with software development and the integration of customised information systems.

Startup is a newly created company that markets products and/or services through the intensive use of information and communication technologies (ICTs), with a scalable business model that allows for rapid and sustained growth over time. This strong technological component allows them to scale their business in a quick and agile way, and with a lower capital requirement than traditional companies.
Application still under development. It is recommended to have automatic updates activated in order to receive the latest improvements and functionalities not yet implemented.
Follow us on our social networks:
agricultON on Twitter, Facebook e Instagram

This is an application for academic purposes that has been developed as part of a laboratory project in the subject Information Systems Management at the Escuela Superior Informática de Ciudad Real during the 2020/2021 academic year.
Any form of reproduction, distribution, public communication or transformation of this work may only be carried out with the authorisation of its owners, unless otherwise provided by law.
